thread.title: Zambia: Youths' Low Turn Out Worries CEEC
thread.title_full: Zambia: Youths' Low Turn Out Worries CEEC

title: Zambia: Youths' Low Turn Out Worries CEEC
text:
Zambia: WCFCB Seals Deal With Standard Chartered 
"The Commission concentrates on empowering the youths, women and the disabled, among these, youths have been allocated 40 percent funding, but they are not accessing the fund. They are not meeting their target," she said. 
She said young people being the majority had the capacity to contribute to the economic growth of the nation. 
The Commission had however received an overwhelming number of women getting on board to access the empowerment fund. 
She urged women to continue accessing funding and improve their business to help foster development in the country. 
"We are happy that a number of women are coming on board to access the funds, they are performing very well and bringing back the borrowed money on time," she said. Zambia
